item.title: How to Mock Final Classes?
item.description:
How to mock classes that are defined as final or some of their methods areÂ final?
Mocking means replacing the original object with its testing imitation that does not perform any functionality and just looks like the original object. And pretending the behavior we need toÂ test.
For example, instead of a PDO with methods like query() etc., we create a mock that pretends working with the database, and instead verifies that the correct SQL statements are called, etc. More e.g. in the Mockery documentation.
